title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees
description: This course is designed to help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
goal: help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.content: An introduction to the features and benefits of using Microsoft Teams for remote work.

sections.title: Setting Up Your Profile
sections.content: How to personalize your profile, set up notifications, and customize settings in Teams.

sections.title: Sending Messages
sections.content: Learn how to send messages, create chat threads, and use emojis and reactions.

sections.title: Voice and Video Calls
sections.content: How to make voice and video calls in Teams, including one-on-one and group calls.

sections.title: Creating a Meeting
sections.content: Step-by-step guide on how to schedule meetings with colleagues using Microsoft Teams.

sections.title: Joining a Meeting
sections.content: Instructions for joining scheduled meetings, including tips for managing audio and video settings.

sections.title: Storing and Sharing Files
sections.content: How to store files in the cloud using Microsoft Teams and share them securely with team members.

sections.title: Collaborating on Documents
sections.content: Using co-authoring features for real-time collaboration on documents, spreadsheets, and presentations.

sections.title: Adding Useful Apps
sections.content: How to find and add apps that integrate with Microsoft Teams to enhance productivity.

sections.title: Using Third-Party Integrations
sections.content: Instructions for using third-party integrations like Trello, Asana, and more within Teams.
